verses.roman:
mahārāṣṭrīya vipra āsi' tāṅhāre mililā
prabhu tāṅre sneha kari' kṛpā prakāśilā

synonyms: mahārāṣṭrīya vipra—the Mahārāṣṭrīya brāhmaṇa; āsi'-coming; tāṅhāre—him; mililā—met; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—to him; sneha kari'-showing His affection; kṛpā prakāśilā—distributed His mercy.
translation: The Mahārāṣṭrīya brāhmaṇa came, and the Lord met him. Out of affection, the Lord bestowed His mercy upon him.
